channel.title: simon-denommebrown on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in simon-denommebrown on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am a PhD candidate in Integrative Biology supervised by Dr.â€™s Karl Cottenie and Andrew McAdam. I completed my undergraduate degree in Ecology at University of Guelph in 2012. During my degree I completed undergraduate research projects assessing the status of at risk butterfly populations, as well as the effect that Emerald Ash Borer caused tree death had on the structure of local song-bird communities. I began my graduate studies at Guelph as an MSc.
